item.title: Cloudflare Traffic sequence
item.description:
Traffic sequence

Traffic to your application runs through the following sequence on Cloudflare’s edge:

  1. DDoS
  2. URL Rewrites
  3. Page Rules
  4. IP Access Rules
  5. Bots
  6. Firewall Rules
  7. Rate Limiting
  8. Managed Rules
  9. Header Modification
  10. Access
  11. Workers
